channel.title: Shot a crossbow
channel.description:
Shot a crossbow irl. (This relates to Runescape)
Runescape makes it look easy.
Pulling the string back with one hand and somehow reloading it with the same hand in under 2 seconds amazes me.
The bow irl, you have to put down on the ground vertically, and put your foot through the thing at the end, and use 150-200 pounds of force to get the string back.
[quote="the elve age"]Lol, the point of this thread is just to show dumb some of the things we do on RS.
But.. Its a game soo..[/quote]

item.title: Shot a crossbow
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

Well i did the same gawd damn thing except with wc and well this is my story.

Well i went out into the woods with only my iron hatchet (I know i’m such a n3wb irl) and i started searching for a willow tree. Once i had found one i was so glad noone was there cutting it to so i began. Now i didn’t know this, but i guess trees actually fall when you are done chopping them and instead it fell down. So now i’m like wtf? So i decide to go afk for about 2 days. and still no tree?

Well that was my story and at this rate i will never get 99 wc IRL. :[

Read full topic

item.title: Shot a crossbow
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

There’s over 99999999999 items in the G.E. yet no storage room? or do they hide it in the cone thingy in the middle.
How comes gold is the same price as needles which is made from metal…
How can you kill a monster 5x your size without being flattened.

Read full topic

item.title: Shot a crossbow
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:361243”]Today i found this out irl

•You cant eat or cook a lobster in 500ms. It took me 3 hours to do both
•If you dont shit, it hurts. How does RS Character deal with constipation?
•If you dont piss, you will just blow up. Where does RS Character pee pee? his pants?
•MY cooking level is 99 and i cant a cook a fucking cake! Glitch?

Anybody got a reasonable explanation?[/quote]Yea, you’re a troll.

Read full topic

item.title: Shot a crossbow
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Did we also forget that our characters seem to never drink any liquids? Did we also forget that our players seem to never have to sleep. Did we forget that our characters somehow are able to carry 28 dragon platebodies in a backpack, yet when we equip it it takes up like half our body…

Read full topic

item.title: Shot a crossbow
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:19, topic:361096”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=457384.msg3348383#msg3348383 date=1285020969]

I shot a crossbow, a normal bow(not magic so no special attack), slashed stuff with swords, wore a suit of armour(yes a metal one), rode a horse, lived on a farm, and had a shield.

Damn I must got good atk, str, def, range, farming, and summoning?

Oh and I have cut trees down so woodcutting, and I have fires like every night so firemaking.

I can understand all the color coded ones, but what the fuck does riding a horse have to do with summoning?
[/quote]
WHO THE FUCK KNOWS[/quote]
lmfao =] get on msn krack

Read full topic
